page.title: 11LOCAL PEOPLE OF OWERMOIGNE
page.content: OUR LOCAL{POLICEMAN,P.C.POWELL,}COVERS AN AREA OF{80 SQUARE MILES.}HIS DUTY IS {1.PROTECT LIFE 2.PROTECT PROPERTY} {3.CATCH CRIMINALS.}MOST OF HIS DAY IS SPENT CHECKING ON PROPERTIES,PUBLIC RELATIONS AND IMPROVING ROAD SAFETY, PARTICULARLY NOTING ROAD CONDITIONS, VEHICLES AND DRIVERS/PEDESTRIANS. {LOCALLY HIS PROBLEM IS THE OLD PEOPLE/ {YOUTH FRICTION IN OWERMOIGNE.}ONE OF THE OLDEST AND LONGEST INHABITANTS TOLD US SHE THINKS THAT THE VILLAGE IS SPOILT WITH ITS NEW RESIDENTS CUTTING DOWN TREES,TRAFFIC PROBLEMS AND NEW BUILDINGS.A NEW AND HAPPY RESIDENT CHOSE TO LIVE HERE NEAR HIS FAMILY IN A BEAUTIFUL BUT QUIET PART OF THE COUNTRY.THE{WHITTY FAMILY}HAS LIVED IN OWERMOIGNE FOR AT LEAST{6 GENERATIONS} AND HAS{NUMEROUS RELATIVES}STILL LIVING WITHIN 8 MILES.
